thoughts.text: The clone_repository command returned an error message stating that the destination path already exists and is not an empty directory. This means that the Rosetta Stone repository has already been cloned to the specified directory. I can now use the execute_shell command to download and install Rosetta Stone on Wine.
thoughts.reasoning: Since the Rosetta Stone repository has already been cloned to the specified directory, I can use the execute_shell command to download and install Rosetta Stone on Wine.
thoughts.plan:
- Use the execute_shell command to download and install Rosetta Stone on Wine
- Use the app to learn different languages
thoughts.criticism: I should be careful not to rely solely on language learning apps. It's important to also practice speaking and listening to the language with native speakers.
thoughts.speak: The clone_repository command returned an error message stating that the destination path already exists and is not an empty directory. This means that the Rosetta Stone repository has already been cloned to the specified directory. I can now use the execute_shell command to download and install Rosetta Stone on Wine. What is the command to execute the command.sh file?
